field.eval: """%for o in object.address:\n \n \n ${object.name or ''}${object.title and ' '+object.title or ''}\n ${o.title and o.title+' ' or ''}${o.name or ''}\n ${o.street or ''}\n ${o.street2 or ''}\n ${o.zip or ''} ${o.city or ''}\n ${o.state_id.name or ''}\n ${o.country_id.name or ''}\n \n \n \n %endfor"""
field.name: def_body_text

field.eval:
"""<blockTableStyle id='mytable'>
 <blockAlignment value='CENTER' />
 <blockValign value='MIDDLE' />
 <lineStyle kind='GRID' colorName='black' tickness='1' />
 </blockTableStyle>"""
field.name: report_stylesheets

field.eval: """\n \n ${object.partner_id.name or ''}${object.partner_id.title and ' '+object.partner_id.title or ''}\n ${object.title and object.title+' ' or ''}${object.name or ''}\n ${object.street or ''}\n ${object.street2 or ''}\n ${object.zip or ''} ${object.city or ''}\n ${object.state_id.name or ''}\n ${object.country_id.name or ''}\n \n \n """
field.name: def_body_text

field.eval:
"""<blockTableStyle id='mytable'>
 <blockAlignment value='CENTER' />
 <blockValign value='MIDDLE' />
 <lineStyle kind='GRID' colorName='black' tickness='1' />
 </blockTableStyle>"""
field.name: report_stylesheets
